de.uni_stuttgart.ims.compranking.rank.jfsa

Class JFSARanker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.compranking.rank.jfsa.JFSARanker

  • public class JFSARanker
extends java.lang.Object
    Ranks products by the ranking depending on the analysis of JFSA.
    Author:
    kesslewd

      • JFSARanker

        public JFSARanker(AspectFilter aspectFilter,
                  ProductMapper prodmapper,
                  ProductOpinionCounterPosNeg.PolarityMode usePolarityMode,
                  AspectFilter.NormAspect useNormAspect,
                  boolean useNormalization)
        Ranks products by the ranking depending on the analysis of JFSA.
        Parameters:
        aspectFilter - Aspect-specific analysis.
        prodmapper - Map reviews to products.
        usePolarityMode - Counting of negative phrases.
        useNormAspect - Which aspect to consider.
        useNormalization - Normalization of scores.
